post.author: thomas lee
post.content:
I like to propose Spouse Appreciation day. We coulb have a picnic. Programs --------- - Flower presentation to spouse ceremony - prepare and read love letter to each spouse in public. It could be interesting and embarassing. It will be fun. - 50 meters dash contest with spouse on the back - Couple games Speed Quiz : couple's communication skill test 3 legged race : Couple's team work test more games
If you are interested in, put you name down below Password : you know Participants -------------- Thomas Lee Spancer Hwang
post.title: RE: 10년 전에...
